description: Complete analytics map for the premium bus booking journey from landing to ticket activation, including pass-based and bulk booking flows.

bookingId.description: Unique booking identifier assigned after successful booking creation.

tripId.description: Specific trip identifier for the selected slot.

routeId.description: Route identifier for the premium bus service.

pickupStopId.description: Alias for fromStopId used in some contexts.

pickupStopName.description: Alias for fromStopName used in some contexts.

dropStopId.description: Alias for toStopId used in some contexts.

dropStopName.description: Alias for toStopName used in some contexts.

pickUpId.description: OD pair pickup stop ID (used in stop selection).

dropId.description: OD pair drop stop ID (used in stop selection).

sourceName.description: Source location name entered by user.

sourceType.description: Type of source location (e.g., place, address).

destinationName.description: Destination location name entered by user.

flow.description: Flow token used in some contexts to identify the journey type.

selectedSlotTripId.description: Trip ID of the selected slot.

selectedSlotTime.description: Departure time of the selected slot.

selectedSlotArrivalTime.description: Arrival time of the selected slot.

selectedSlotSeatAvailable.description: Number of seats available in the selected slot.

selectedSlotRouteId.description: Route ID of the selected slot.

slotFromStopTime.description: Time at which the slot departs from the pickup stop.

slotTripStartTime.description: Trip start time for the slot.

nextAvailableTimeSlot.description: Next available time slot if current selection is full.

numberOfActiveSlots.description: Total number of active slots across all days.

numberOfSoldOutSlots.description: Total number of sold out slots across all days.

currentDayActiveSlotCount.description: Number of active slots for the currently selected day.

currentDaySoldOutSlotCount.description: Number of sold out slots for the currently selected day.

selectedSection.description: Selected date section/tab in slot selection screen.

isAnySlotAvailable.description: Whether any slot is available for booking.

routesForSelectedOD.description: Number of routes available for the selected OD pair.

selectedSeatType.description: Type of selected seat (regular, reserved, etc.).

selectedSeatStatus.description: Status of selected seat (available, unavailable, selected).

selectedSeatReservationType.description: Reservation type for the seat (e.g., female-reserved).

selectedSeatX.description: X coordinate of selected seat in layout.

selectedSeatY.description: Y coordinate of selected seat in layout.

noOfSeatsSelected.description: Count of seats selected by user.

totalSeats.description: Total number of seats in the bus layout.

numberOfCombinationsShown.description: Number of OD combinations shown to user.

firstMileWalkingTime.description: Walking time from source to pickup stop (in minutes).

lastMileWalkingTime.description: Walking time from drop stop to destination (in minutes).

combinedWalkingTime.description: Total walking time for first and last mile.

firstCombinationWalkingTime.description: Walking time for the first suggested OD combination.

firstCombinationPickUpId.description: Pickup stop ID of first suggested combination.

firstCombinationPickUpName.description: Pickup stop name of first suggested combination.

firstCombinationDropId.description: Drop stop ID of first suggested combination.

firstCombinationDropName.description: Drop stop name of first suggested combination.

searchSource.description: Source of the search (e.g., home screen, deeplink).

isNewLandingScreen.description: Whether the new landing screen design is shown.

supportedPassesCount.description: Number of passes supported for current OD pair.

totalODPairs.description: Total number of OD pairs available.

isRescheduledODFound.description: Whether the rescheduled booking's OD pair was found.

activeAndVisibleProductSize.description: Number of active and visible products.

appliedRulesId.description: List of applied discount/fare rule IDs.

pbAckCtaType.description: Type of CTA clicked on acknowledgment screen.

delayInFetchingEta.description: Delay in fetching ETA after screen open (millis).

timeWhenEtaRenderedFirstTime.description: Timestamp when ETA was first rendered (millis).

isFirstTimeEtaCame.description: Whether this is the first time ETA was received.

lastPacketReceivedTimeInMillis.description: Timestamp of last tracking packet received.

timeDifferenceBetweenPacketsInMillis.description: Time difference between consecutive tracking packets.

activeBookingActionType.description: Type of action on active booking.

premiumBusStackType.description: Type of premium bus booking stack.

cancellationEligibilityCopy.description: Eligibility copy shown on cancellation dialog.

numberOfTrips.description: Number of trips in bulk booking.

numberOfTripsPerDay.description: Number of trips per day in bulk booking.

numberOfDaysInRange.description: Number of days in date range for bulk booking.

selectedWeekdays.description: List of selected weekdays for bulk booking.

selectedStartDate.description: Selected start date for bulk booking.

selectedEndDate.description: Selected end date for bulk booking.

rideNumber.description: Ride number in bulk booking sequence.

numberOfSlotsShown.description: Number of slots shown to user.

numberOfSlotsWithLimitedAvailabilityShow.description: Number of slots with limited availability.

activeRides.description: Number of active rides in pass.

bookingCancelledRides.description: Number of cancelled rides in pass.

isTicketAvailable.description: Whether ticket is available for re-booking.

isBulkBookingPass.description: Whether this is a bulk booking pass.

newPurchaseFlow.description: Whether new purchase flow is being used.

rollOverEligible.description: Whether pass is eligible for rollover.

advanceBookingDays.description: Number of days in advance booking is allowed.

route id.description: Auto-documented from code; validate semantics and expected values.

payload.description: Auto-documented from code; validate semantics and expected values.

diagram.description: Premium bus booking flow splits into multiple paths based on whether user has a pass, is doing fresh booking, or bulk booking. All paths converge at ticket activation.

paths.name: Fresh Booking (No Pass)
steps: premium bus seat selection select seats clicked

paths.name: Pass Purchase & Booking
steps: pb pass purchase landing screen opened
pb pass landing screen od pair clicked
pb pass purchased card clicked by user

paths.name: Bulk Booking (Pass-Based)
steps: pb bulk booking manage rides screen opened
pb bulk booking book multiple rides click
pb slot selection screen opened (for each day)
bulk booking confirm rides page shown

paths.name: Single Ride via Pass
steps: pb bulk booking manage rides screen opened
pb bulk booking book single ride click

diagram.notes: All successful bookings converge at the activation screen where users can track their trip live. Pass-based bookings skip payment, while fresh bookings go through the checkout module.
